task_description:
# Compliance Violation Detection & Reporting

Enhance job role compliance matrix with automated detection of role violations, visual compliance dashboard, and exportable compliance reports for auditors.

## Rationale
Manual compliance checking is error-prone and time-consuming. Credit union regulatory requirements demand robust access controls. This addresses a key differentiator (credit union compliance needs not met by generic IAM per gap-5) and strengthens WhoDis's unique value proposition for financial services.

## User Stories
- As a compliance officer, I want automated violation detection so that I don't miss access control issues
- As an auditor, I want exportable compliance reports so that I can include them in audit documentation

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Automated daily scan comparing actual roles to expected roles per job code
- [ ] Compliance dashboard showing: Compliant users %, Violations by type, Trend over time
- [ ] Violation types: Missing required role, Excessive privileges, Unknown job code
- [ ] Violation drill-down with user details and specific role mismatches
- [ ] Export compliance report in format suitable for auditors (PDF with attestation)
- [ ] Email notification to compliance team on new violations detected
- [ ] Bulk action to generate access review tickets for violations
